title: The learning Process
brief: One thing that helps me keep myself up to date is learning. As a Software Engineer irrespective of your experience, you need to keep learning. Let's take a look at how you can motivate yourself to learn, make learning fun, and retain what you learn.
author: Peter Mutisya

title: The Log4j Vulnerability: What it means
brief: The world was hit by a major log4j vulnerability. This is what it means to have it
